BCC: 
Date: 2025-05-30 12:14
Subject: REPOSSI / ZIMMERMANN The Galleria Al Maryah Island -  Public liability insurance
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Hagop,

 

Hope all is well.

 

Kindly arrange to share copies of the PLI Certificates for the stores listed below at your earliest convenience.

 

*	Zimmermann The Galleria Al Maryah Island 
*	Repossi The Galleria Al Maryah Island 

 

Please note that we need to obtain approval from the landlord (LL) before proceeding with merchandising, which is scheduled for 29th June 2025.

 

Regards,

 

alma quinto	
associate ‑ project administration	
	
 <https://www.linkedin.com/company/3d-develop-design-deliver> 	
	
UAE: T.+ 971 4 804 5000   A. Jebel Ali Free Zone, Dubai. P.O.Box: 60943
KSA: T.+ 966 12 229 6000    A. Al Zahra District, Jeddah.    P.O.Box: 2489
	
www.3d-consultants.com <http://3d-consultants.com/>  
	
A company by Chalhoub group
